title: Persistent absences for pupils looked after by local authorities

versions.title: Persistent absences for pupils looked after by local authorities
versions.summary: Percentage of pupils who have been looked after by the local authorities over financial years 2016/17 - 2021/22.
versions.description: This dataset shows the percentage of pupils in state-funded primary, state funded secondary, special schools and pupil referral units who have been looked after continuously for at least 12 months (as of 31 March of that year) by local authorities who were persistently absent (those absent for 10% of schooling sessions) during the academic year, in England for financial years 2016/17 - 2021/22.

columns.name: period
columns.description: The time period associated with the observation.

columns.name: areacd
columns.description: The statistical geography of the observation being measured.

columns.name: observation
columns.titles: Percentage of pupils who have been looked after by the local authorities over financial years 2016/17 - 2021/22
columns.description: Observation value of pupils that have been looked after continuously for atleast 12 months over financial years 2016/17 - 2021/22.

columns.name: measure
columns.description: Measure type asscoiated with the observation value.

columns.name: unit
columns.description: Unit of measure of observation value.

columns.name: lower_confidence_interval_95
columns.description: The interval estimate gives an indication of how much uncertainty there is in our estimate of the true mean, lower bound.

columns.name: upper_confidence_interval_95
columns.description: The interval estimate gives an indication of how much uncertainty there is in our estimate of the true mean, upper bound.

columns.name: observation_status
columns.description: Additional context to the observation value, if needed.
